Caroline Gibello (amụrụ n'afọ 1974), bụ onye na-ese foto nà South Africa
N'afọ 2007, o guzobere ụlọ ngosi nka Galleria Gibello na Cape Town, South Africa.
A kpọrọ usoro ọrụ ọganihu Gibello "Na Stillpoint nke Turning World"
Nke a meghere ụfọdụ ọnụ ụzọ banyere ya ma mee ka ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ, ndị na-anakọta ihe osise, ndị na'ime ime ụlọ, na nchịkọta ihe osise mba na-anakọtara ọrụ ya.
N'afọ 2008, Gibello gara Southern Africa na-eleta Namibia, Botswana na Mozambique
N'oge njem ya, o sere foto dị iche iche nke ghọrọ usoro "Water & Dust" ya
O gosipụtara ọrụ ahụ na Centre for the Book na Cape Town, South Africa, n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 2008
Ihe ngosi ahụ bụ njikọ aka n'etiti Gibello na ezigbo enyi, onye na-ese ihe osise na onye na-eme ihe osise, Sharon Boonzaier
Ihe ngosi ahụ nwere foto dị ọcha na otu ọrụ mmekorita
Ọrụ mmekorita ahụ nwere foto Gibello gbakwunyere na etchings nke Boonzaier na ihe osise mmanụ
Ndị nkatọ nabatara ihe ngosi ahụ nke ọma
N'azụ ihe ịga nke ọma nke ihe ngosi a, a kpọrọ Gibello ka ọ gosipụta na Mumbai (India) n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 2009, Lake Como (Italy) n'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2009 nakwa na Hamburg (Germany) n'afọ 2009.
N'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2009, a họọrọ otu n'ime foto izizi ya site n'afọ 2002 n'ihe banyere mbipụta izizi nke National Geographic Traveler South Africa
A họrọla foto ya ọzọ maka mbipụta nke abụọ nke otu magazin ahụ.
Site n'afọ 2010 ruo afọ 2017 Caroline gara n'ihu na-ewu nnukwu ndị na-eso ụzọ gburugburu ụwa
Ihe osise anụ ọhịa ya n'Afrịka na-anọdụ na mgbidi nke Reserve Bank South Africa, Mahadum Cape Town (UCT), Tuynhuys (The Presidency), yana Deutsche Bank (New York)
Caroline gosipụtara ọrụ ya maka ọnwa Mee 2018 na New York.
